The post Sanrachna appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Sanrachna (Bridge modelling contest)

‍Hola Amigos

Want to showcase your Model Making skills by making the best out of waste but don’t know how?

Association of Civil Engineering Students
conducting “SANRACHNA” (a bridge modelling competition) event under Techno Mela 2023.

  • This will be a one-day event in which there will be 2 rounds.
    The 1st round will be a general questionnaire, including some basic questions related to Traffic engineering and aptitude. This round will be the elimination round; those who will be giving the maximum correct answers will be eligible for the 2nd round.
  • In the 2nd round participants will have to make a model of any structure bridge with the materials provided.

 

Event details

 Date: – 17th March of 2023

 Time: – 10:00 PM onwards

 Venue: – G 18

Participant type: – Team of 4

 

 

Best 3 Designs of the plot will be rewarded with Trophies

NOTE: Gift Hampers from Bonn and Discount coupons La Pino’z Pizza will be provided to the Winners

Participation certificate will be provided to all the participants

 

For Any Queries contact: –

8264240821 (Ayush Sharma)

90799 17262 (Nabeel Farooqui)

 

 For further updates stay connected on –

https://instagram.com/gndec_aces

Register Now
Rules

The post Sanrachna appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.

item.content:encoded:
Techno Plot

‍Hola Amigos

Want to showcase your talent of designing but don’t know how?

Association of Civil Engineering Students

conducting “TECHNOPLOT” event under the Techno Mela 2023.

This will be a one day event in which participants will have to make 2D floor plan of a house using any CAD software for example: Micro-station, AutoCAD or etc.

(You can use computers available in Computational Lab)

 

Event details

 Date: – 16th March of 2023

 Time: – 12:00 PM onwards

 Venue: – Comptational Lab

Participant type: – Solo

 

Best 3 Designs of the plot will be rewarded with Trophies

NOTE: Gift Hampers from Bonn and Discount coupons La Pino’z Pizza will be provided to the Winners

Participation certificate will be provided to all the participants

 

For Any Queries contact: –

8264240821 (Ayush Sharma)

90799 17262 (Nabeel Farooqui)

 

For further updates stay connected on –

https://instagram.com/gndec_aces

Register Now
Rules
Submissions

Participation E-Certificates will be provided Rules: – There has to be 2 minimum and a maximum of 4 members in a team. The performance has to be silent […]

The post Dumbsharas appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Dumbsharas
Event Details: -

Event Details: –
Date: – 16th, March, 2022
Time: – 3PM onwards
Venue: – G2

Participants will have to come in a Team of 2-4 members.

Participation E-Certificates will be provided

Rules: -
  1. There has to be 2 minimum and a maximum of 4 members in a team.
  2. The performance has to be silent with no words.
  3. The player has to use facial expressions, gestures, and body language.
  4. Clues like lip-reading, humming songs, pointing to an object, and making spelling with hands are banned.
  5. Language, the number of words, and the age of the film must be said at first (only in guestures).
  6. There is a particular time limit for teams to guess the movie.
  7. Teams have to alter until every player has acted once(max 4 guests per team).
  8. Scores are recorded for every correct answer and one point if the opposite team fails to guess within the allotted time.
Download Certificates - Dumbsharas
Event Report: -

The Association of Civil Engineering Students (ACES) organized an event named “Dumbsharas”. As evident from the name, it was an offline fun event and was conducted on 16th March 2022. It had 100+ registrations. Students were appointed as disciplined in charge to maintain the decorum, and it was a successful event with the Final participation of 45 students in 12 teams. The event started at 3:30 pm and continued till 04:30 PM as per the rules of the game.

item.title: Article Writing Contest
item.dc:creator: Sharanjit Singh
item.description:
Article Writing Contest An online article writing event was organized by the Association of Civil Engineering Students from 12th September to 16th September 2021. The event was led and executed successfully under the able guidance of Prof.Yuvraj Singh . The event was a part of one of the various technical and social events organized by […]

The post Article Writing Contest appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Article Writing Contest

An online article writing event was organized by the Association of Civil Engineering Students from 12th September to 16th September 2021. The event was led and executed successfully under the able guidance of Prof.Yuvraj Singh .

The event was a part of one of the various technical and social events organized by ACES. These events are organized from time to time with the objective to provide a platform for the students to showcase their talent with a competitive spirit.

The event was successful enough to attract as many as 40+ registrations. The themes for the event included sustainable engineering, automation in engineering, road safety, and traffic management, and recent advances in engineering.

The winners were encouraged with a certificate, trophies and were given the chance to become a part of the college’s newsletter editor board. The participants were also given certificates as a token of encouragement.

Best Entry (Students)

It was a three-round event, conducted on 26th August,2021. The event was conducted using Google form (timed quiz) where all participated in a mind refreshing quiz competition with great  enthusiasm. Total registrations were 88. […]

The post Chatur Naar appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Chatur Naar

In this situation of pandemic Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a virtual Quiz competition named “EK CHATUR”. It was a three-round event, conducted on 26th August,2021. The event was conducted using Google form (timed quiz) where all participated in a mind refreshing quiz competition with great  enthusiasm. Total registrations were 88.

The first round ‘Chalak Chatur’ held from 4:00 PM to 4:16 PM. The second round  ‘Mysterious Chatur’ held from 4:20 PM to 4:41 PM. The third round ‘Intelligent  Chatur’ was conducted from 4:45 PM to 5:05 PM. The results were declared at 8 PM on the ACES official Instagram (@gndec_aces) The winners were decided according  to the maximum total marks in three rounds of quiz and the minimum time taken to  attempt all three quizes. 

Winners
